title: Experience
text:
In last summer vacation, I worked as a teaching assistant to help Canadian high school students with their mathematics studies. I am very willing and enjoy assisting others in gaining new knowledge. If you want to know more about me, you can find my CV below.
My CV

title: Welcome to my site
text: Hi, I’m Yunshu Zhang, a student at the University of Toronto majoring in Math and Statistics. My passion involves deciphering the mysteries around numbers and data, and I am excited to work in an environment where I can use my analytical abilities to solve practical issues. I enjoy seeing unfamiliar places, learning about various cultures, and taking pictures with my camera when I have free time. Please get in touch with me if you’d like to discuss potential collaborations or just talk about anything mathematics, statistics, or travel!
